Content.Text:
<NAME_MARGOT>
Augh! The nerve! It positively makes my blood
boil!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, er...hello <MYNAME>. I suppose you must
have heard that, no?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, it's just that something that happened
earlier practically set my blood to boiling.
<PAGE>
Ugh, you simply MUST let me tell you about it.
It was outrageous!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, earlier this morning, I was walking my son
to school. When we passed the Carpenter's
Shop...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gunther! You forgot something!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You can't head off to work without your lunch,
can you? Here you go.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah. Sorry. I had my mind all wrapped around
work and plumb forgot. Thanks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>I grilled up your favorite fish. Hope you like it! ♪
<PAGE>
And...because I did that, I want you to promise
to eat all of your vegetables too, okay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wellll, all right, I suppose I can do that. Thanks
again. I'll be back in the evening.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't stay out too late, dear!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! Why hello, Mrs. Margot. Is Lutz headed off
to school? You must really have your hands full!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_ANGER_R>She actually said that! Right to my face!
<PAGE>
Can you believe it? The NERVE of that woman!
She was mocking me, wasn't she? Mocking me!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always had my suspicions about her. She
worked her feminine wiles to ensnare a man over
a decade her elder. Un-be-lievable!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And you know what? She's--she's jealous of me.
I have Lutz, and she doesn't have any children of
her own. I'm sure that's it!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you agree?
Yeah.
I don't think so.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I knew you'd see what I see, <MYNAME>. She
WAS mocking me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Augh! Just thinking of it makes my toes curl!

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still, being able to vent has made me feel a bit
better. Thank you for listening.

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_ANGER_R>What?! Are--are you mocking me too,
<MYNAME>?! Or are you wrapped around
that...that carpenter's woman's fingers?

<FACE_MARGOT><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Though...perhaps I may be reading too much
into things.
<PAGE>
And I do feel a little better, now that I've had a
chance to air my grievances.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I apologize, <MYNAME>. I didn't mean to fall
into hysterics in front of you. It's just a bad habit
of mine.
